meanings.definition: To write or inscribe on a scroll.
meanings.sent1: She enscrolled her name beautifully on the ancient scroll.
meanings.sent2: The scribe carefully enscrolled the important message on the parchment.
meanings.sent3: The wizard enscrolled a spell on the magical scroll, causing it to glow.
meanings.sent4: His words enscrolled on the scroll like a river flowing through time.
meanings.sent5: The artist enscrolled intricate designs on the scroll, creating a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: To enroll or register in a list or record.
meanings.sent1: They enscrolled their names on the attendance sheet for the event.
meanings.sent2: Students enscrolled in the course before the deadline to secure their spots.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel enscrolled its name on the list of nut hoarders.
meanings.sent4: Her achievements enscrolled her name in the history books of the town.
meanings.sent5: The brave knight enscrolled his deeds in the annals of valor.
